description.zh: 选择文件后，点击按钮上传。
description.en: Click a button to upload after selecting files.

description.zh: 以追加形式上传文件列表
使用 `beforeUpload` 返回 false 后，控制上传文件列表
description.en: Use `beforeUpload` to return false to control the list of uploaded files

description.zh: 限制同时上传文件的数量。
description.en: Constraint the amount of filed being uploaded at one time.

description.zh: 在组件右上角显示提示信息，如接受的文件类型等。
description.en: Display hint on the top-right corner, such as acceptable types.

description.zh: 可以自定义上传请求得到响应后的处理方式，包括成功和失败。这将覆盖默认的处理行为。
description.en: Customize the response handler, including success and failure. This will override the default handlers.

description.zh: 为一个文件上传请求追加一个`FormData`实例。请查看开发者工具中的 Network 标签。
description.en: Append an extra `FormData` instance to a file upload request. Please checkout the 'Network' tab in the developer tool.

description.zh: 使用 `onRemoveFile` 返回 false 后，不移除
description.en: Don't remove after returning false with `onRemoveFile`

description.zh: 直接调用组件的上传方法，可以使用`showUploadBtn={false}`使自带的上传按钮消失。
description.en: Call `Upload`'s `startUpload` method directly. You can use `showUploadBtn={false}` to hide the original upload button.
